en.title: Build a financial AI search workflow using LangGraph.js and Elasticsearch - Elasticsearch Labs
en.description: Learn how to use LangGraph.js with Elasticsearch to build an AI-powered financial search workflow that turns natural language queries into dynamic, conditional filters for investment and market analysis.

en.title: Using LangExtract and Elasticsearch - Elasticsearch Labs
en.description: Learn to use LangExtract with Elasticsearch via an example. In this tutorial, we'll extract structured data from free-form text & store it as Elastic fields.

en.title: Using CrewAI with Elasticsearch - Elasticsearch Labs
en.description: Learn how to create an Elasticsearch agent with CrewAI for your agent team and perform market research.

en.title: LlamaIndex and Elasticsearch Rerankers: Unbeatable simplicity - Elasticsearch Labs
en.description: Learn about the Elasticsearch Reranker & LlamaIndex RankGPTs, how to use them, and how to transition to the Elastic semantic reranker.

en.title: Using AutoGen with Elasticsearch - Elasticsearch Labs
en.description: Learn to create an Elasticsearch tool for your agents with AutoGen.

en.title: Improving Copilot capabilities using Elasticsearch - Elasticsearch Labs
en.description: Discover how to use Elasticsearch with Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat and Copilot in Microsoft Teams.

en.title: Elasticsearch in JavaScript the proper way, part I - Elasticsearch Labs
en.description: Explaining how to create a production-ready Elasticsearch backend in JavaScript.

en.title: Are synonyms important in RAG? - Elasticsearch Labs
en.description: Exploring the functionality of Elasticsearch synonyms in a Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) application.

en.title: ES|QL in JavaScript: Leveraging Apache Arrow helpers - Elasticsearch Labs
en.description: Learn how to use ES|QL with JavaScript Apache Arrow client helpers.

en.title: Using FastAPI’s WebSockets and Elasticsearch to build a real-time app - Elasticsearch Labs
en.description: Learn how to build a real-time application using FastAPI WebSockets and Elasticsearch.

en.title: Elastic Playground: Using Elastic connectors to chat with your data - Elasticsearch Labs
en.description: Learn how to use Elastic connectors and Playground to chat with your data. We'll start by using connectors to search for information in different sources.

en.title: Ingesting data into Elasticsearch with BigQuery - Elasticsearch Labs
en.description: Exploring the BigQuery and Elasticsearch integration. Follow this step-by-step tutorial to index and search BigQuery data in Elasticsearch using Python.

en.title: Using Ollama with the Inference API - Elasticsearch Labs
en.description: Learn how to integrate Ollama with Elasticsearch using the Ollama API, which is compatible with the OpenAI API, making the integration easier.

en.title: Building Elasticsearch APIs with FastAPI - Elasticsearch Labs
en.description: Learn how to build an Elasticsearch API with FastAPI using Pydantic schemas and FastAPI background tasks, demonstrated with a practical example.

en.title: AI-powered dashboards: From a vision to Kibana - Elasticsearch Labs
en.description: Learn how to generate AI-powered dashboards. We’ll use an LLM to process an image and then turn it into a Kibana dashboard.

en.title: Indexing OneLake data into Elasticsearch - Part II - Elasticsearch Labs
en.description: Learn to index & search OneLake data into Elastic with a custom connector. We’ll show you how to create a OneLake Elasticsearch connector to sync data.

en.title: Longer context ≠ better: Why RAG still matters - Elasticsearch Labs
en.description: Comparing RAG with just sending everything to a long context model and letting the LLM analyze the context and answer a question.

en.title: Elasticsearch in JavaScript the proper way, part II - Elasticsearch Labs
en.description: Reviewing production best practices and explaining how to run the Elasticsearch Node.js client in Serverless environments.

en.title: Using LlamaIndex Workflows with Elasticsearch - Elasticsearch Labs
en.description: Learn how to create an Elasticsearch-based step for your LlamaIndex workflow.

en.title: Exploring OpenAI CLIP alternatives - Elasticsearch Labs
en.description: Learn about OpenAI’s CLIP, its configuration, and alternatives for image-to-image and text-to-image search like JinaCLIP & Cohere Image Embeddings V3.
